FuncDef:
The description command configures the description of an interface.
The undo description command deletes the description of an interface. The description command configures the description of an interface. The undo description command deletes the description of an interface. By default, the description of an interface is empty.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 242 case-sensitive characters, with spaces supported.

ExtraInfo: To help simplify interface management, run the description command on an interface to identify the interface and describe the function of the interface.
